templates.name: Can I swim or play sports with my hair extensions?
templates.content:
One of the most important things to keep in mind when wearing hair extensions is to not wear them while swimming or taking a shower. You can definitely wear them to the beach or by the pool, however, we do not recommend getting into the water with them (unless your hair is tied up and will not get wet).

Avoid doing any physical activity that could lead to excessive sweat, when you are wearing hair extensions. Remember, your sweat is salty, acidic and can dry out your hair extensions so this could lead to additional matting and tangling, causing your hair extensions to deteriorate faster.

templates.name: Heating Instructions (Stovetop)
templates.content: Heat saucepan over medium heat. Empty food from cup into saucepan. We recommend adding 2 tablespoons of water (or another liquid of your choice) along to the saucepan to reach a better consistency. Cook for 8-10 minutes or until heated through, stirring frequently. Carefully mix and test temperature. Cool to desired temperature before serving.

templates.name: Should I wet my hair before applying DYEposit?

templates.name: Can I freeze your products?
templates.content:
Our products aren't meant to be frozen so we don't recommend freezing them for a number of reasons not least of which is because we cannot guarantee the nutritional benefits will remain intact once a frozen state is reached. 

That being said, the real nutritional damage happens if the products are frozen for long periods of time or if the product is thawed out and then frozen again. So making some quick popsicles and eating them within a few days is no problem, but storing them for future use in a frozen state can get a bit dicey. Please be sure not to use the microwave when thawing the products!

templates.name: Are your bottles/tumblers dishwasher safe?
templates.content:
Our bottles and tumblers are top rack dishwasher safe. We do however recommend that you use low heat drying. Lids are dishwasher safe however, there is a rubber seal inside of our 36oz & 26oz Shaker lids and our 26oz Flex lids that may need to be removed and cleaned from time to time. To do this, simply use a butter knife (or similar dull object) and gently pry the seal out. Wash the seal and insert it back into the bottom of the lid. When you do this, be sure that the seal is not twisted and is sitting flat to ensure that there will not be any leakage.

Please note that bottles and tumblers with a patterned design should be washed by hand only to prevent discoloration of the pattern.

templates.name: Can it be hung in bathrooms and kitchens?
templates.content:
While our papers can be hung in bathrooms and kitchens, they're not suitable for high humidity
areas. If planning to paper a humid room, please fully consider the general environment of the
room and potential implications before you proceed.
Local conditions will differ from room to room depending on size, extraction, and general
humidity, all of which give varying levels of condensation. As such, we can't guarantee our
papers' suitability across all situations.
You can read this article for more information
https://www.miltonandking.com/blog/wallpaper-in-the-bathroom/

templates.name: What’s the difference between the Emma Original Mattress and the Emma Hybrid Comfort?
templates.content:
The award-winning Emma Original Mattress is recommended for all sleepers, regardless of your sleeping position. Made with the breathable AIRGOCELL® and HRX Supreme base layer, the Emma Original distributes body weight evenly, relieves pressure and eliminates motion transfer for your best night's sleep.

The Emma Hybrid Comfort is recommended for sleepers who want extra support, and for those who want to do more than sleep. It combines the award-winning comfort, zero motion transfer, zoned support and pressure relief of our Emma Original with the breathability, bounce and extra support of our Climax® Pocketed Springs. Both Emma mattresses are considered medium-firm, offering the perfect mix of comfort and support.

templates.name: What is PLA?
templates.content:
PLA is a plant-based bioplastic. We've done the work to make sure our raw materials are sustainably sourced down to the tiniest detail.

We take carbon and other organic elements primarily from corn grown in the USA and extract them into polylactic acid (PLA) resin. Other plants like sugarcane, beets, and cassava can also be used. Once in resin form, PLA is perfect for being molded into durable and flexible products like our compostable cups and utensils.

templates.name: How do I determine what size tube I need for my stuffer?
templates.content: To determine the size tube you need for your stuffer you would first measure the base of an existing tube. If you do not have a tube that fits your stuffer, measure the diameter of the interior of the retaining ring. The retaining ring is the "nut" that holds the tubes on the stuffer. After the base size is determined you will have to determine the size of casing you will be stuffing and purchase a tube of the correct diameter to fit inside the casing.

templates.name: How can I clean my cookware?
templates.content:
For everyday cleaning, we recommend hand-washing with warm soapy water and a sponge. While our pots and pans are dishwasher safe, using a dishwasher may cause your cookware to look dull or black over time. Additionally, phosphate-free detergents can etch or even pockmark the surface of the metal. 

Our pans are hybrid pans and contain stainless steel so temporary staining can occur. To remove a stain from your pan, use an aforementioned abrasive sponge and warm soapy water. Afterwards your pans will look brand new!

To deep clean your HexClad Cookware, we recommend using Bar Keeper's Friend and a brand new SOS steel wool scrubbing pad with hot water.  After any deep cleaning, it is important to re-season the pan.

templates.name: Whole Genome Sequencing- What Is the Benefit?
templates.content:
You're welcome to compare our products here: https://basepaws.com/pages/compare The Whole Genome Sequencing test gives you access to the same DNA results as the Breed+Health Test, but there are a couple of added bonuses. First, with WGS, your cat's genome is covered 15 times more than our standard test, and with this data, you will receive a flash drive with your cat's genetic code. Those with a background in bioinformatics and genetics can use this data to find genes and other mutations within this code.

WGS tests also receive free health and breed updates for life, while the standard DNA test provides just free breed updates. Finally, this test comes with a 1-hour consultation with an expert on feline genetics.

templates.name: How can I choose the best adult pull-ups?
templates.content: To find the best adult pull-up we recommend these steps: First, decide what absorbency level you need. For dribbles or one full void, you probably need something moderate. For 2-4 voids, you'll want something "heavy." If you have many full voids or need something for overnight protection, look for an overnight absorbency. Next, decide what features are most important to you. You may want to look for an odor guard, more feminine or masculine colors, or a more breathable waist band. Third, choose your size. Incontinence products aren't like clothes, and tend to be a little larger than traditionally-sized products. It's best to measure your waist and hip sizes in inches, then choose the larger of the two to reference the sizing guides we include with every product.

templates.name: What's the difference between your Sateen, Sateen+ and Twill products?
templates.content:
Sateen is our signature fabric. Made with CleanBamboo from 100% sustainably sourced bamboo - the most resource-efficient plant on the planet - our material is cloud-soft, cooling, and sustainable. Our Sateen+ products have the same look and feel as our Sateen line but the CleanBamboo fiber is infused with naturally antimicrobial bamboo charcoal to absorb unwanted odors, wick away moisture and reduce bacteria by 99.9%.

Our Twill products are made from our CleanBamboo fiber and utilizes a twill weave - the same weave used in denim jeans - to create a slightly heavier and more durable feel compared to Sateen and Sateen+.

templates.name: Can you use the laser underneath the eyebrows or above the top eyelid?
templates.content:
The laser is designed to be safe for use around the eye area, but under no circumstances should we treat the eyelid, and under no circumstances should we angle the laser towards the eye.

While the laser doesn't emit visible light, the infrared might cause heating of the cornea. The skin can tolerate this heating, and it's normal, healthy, and thought to promote collagen production. On the other hand, the eye is less heat-tolerant, and we strongly advise against pointing the laser toward the eye.

The solution is to angle the laser away from the eye. You can treat the upper eyelid by raising your eyebrow and applying laser treatment to the bone above the eye. This is safe and clinically proven.

templates.name: What is the difference between the Series 7 and Series 9 trimmers?
templates.content: The Braun Series 7 offers exceptional shaving and trimming performance, equipped with Intelligent Sonic and AutoSensing technology to adapt to different hair densities. In contrast, the Braun Series 9 trimmers take it a step further with a superior cutting force, thanks to its five synchronized shaving elements that capture more hair in one stroke. Both series ensure a close and comfortable shave, yet the Series 9 surpasses the Series 7 in terms of powerful performance and precision. Ultimately, the choice between the two depends on individual preferences and priorities.

templates.name: What's the difference between your Alpha products?
templates.content: The Alpha Brain and Alpha Brain Instant are pretty much the same, there is no difference in strength and formula, what makes them different is the delivery method. The Alpha Brain Focus Shot isn't far off from that, though it has some natural caffeine included, so there is a bit more of a 'boost' for you. Alpha Brain Black Label stands apart from the rest as it's the most intense formula that's not intended for daily use like the rest - think of it as your "break in case of emergency" that helps you focus on a task. It's ideal for the experienced Alpha user that's looking to level up. In short, it all depends on what you're looking to get out of it. If it's daily support, the original capsule or Instant would be the best place to start, but if you've taken one of those before and need something more, look towards Black Label.

templates.name: Is there a certain way to walk with platforms?
templates.content: Wearing platforms comes with its own challenges compared to typical thin-sole shoes, so be careful when bending down, try to squat and keep your heels on the ground. Don't stand on the ball of your foot as you naturally would, as platforms don't flex like sneaker soles, so the stress of repeating this may result in the heel separating from the platform. Always unzip your shoes fully when taking them off. You don't want to use overt force when you put on/take off your shoes, as you can split the zipper doing this. If the zipper of your new pair is hard to pull, try rubbing a wax candle (or bar soap) on the teeth while undone, this can help to lubricate it and help it break in smoothly. We also recommend against driving and traversing wet/icy floors while wearing platforms.

templates.name: The lid on my Stainless Clad is not coming off, how do I fix it?
templates.content:
Stainless Clad lids can create a strong seal due to the temperature difference between the covered hot air inside the pan and cooler air in your kitchen. This most often occurs if you cover the pan and then immediately turn down the heat. Instead, make any large temperature adjustments prior to covering your pan to avoid creating a vacuum. You can also lift the lid slightly if you need to turn the heat from medium to low, for example, to avoid this.

To remove the lid, bring the pan to low heat on your stovetop or run hot water over the pan inside the sink. Allow some time for the air inside to heat and release the vacuum seal. While holding the pan firmly, grasp the lid's handle, and pull upwards. This will release the vacuum seal.

templates.name: The shoes are very uncomfortable and cause me pain
templates.content:
Birkenstock footwear can require a break-in process that varies from person to person. Some people can break in their footwear in a matter of days, while others may take longer. 
 
We recommend only wearing your new Birkenstock footwear for 30 minutes to an hour at a time while performing light activities. This allows the feet and body to gradually get used to the contoured arch support and straps. You can then gradually increase the amount of time you are wearing the sandals until they have been completely broken in.

templates.name: Will a safety razor prevent ingrown hairs and razor burn?
templates.content: Yes, it can! Since a single-blade (safety razor) shaves your hair at skin level, there are fewer chances of hair regrowth getting trapped below the epidermis, the surface of the skin. When hair has to struggle through your follicles, it causes irritation of those very follicles, resulting in itchy, inflamed regrowth. Ingrowns occur when that blunt hair gets trapped in the follicle and curls back under the skin. This happens less with a safety razor because it never shaves the hair below the surface of the skin to begin with.

templates.name: What are the differences in your beds?
templates.content: The Orthopedic, washable and waterproof bed is ideal for elderly, large arthritic dogs and those with joint and muscular problems.  The 3-sided bolster bed is similar to the standard orthopedic, but with bolsters on 3 sides for pups that like to lean against an edge or have something secure against their back or sides.  The Chew resistant bed is designed with aggressive chewers in mind and it has extra strong padding and fabric that is resistant to wear and tear.  The Round sherpa bed would be the best type to buy if your dog prefers to sleep curled up and legs tucked in.  The Infrared bed is the first and only bed that has FDA medical device certification and have been shown to have advantageous effects in treating joint and shoulder stiffness, muscle pain, arthritis and similar conditions as it treats the whole body and not just a specific symptom.  The Calming bed is great for dogs that prefer a softer bed or those that just need to sink into a place of their own.

templates.name: What surfaces are recommended?

templates.name: Does Ristela cause weight gain?
templates.content: Weight gain is one symptom many women experience during menopause. Metabolism slows as women age, and if they do not adjust their energy intake or output, it may result in weight gain. We have no evidence that our Ristela and Bonafide products cause increased appetite, decreased metabolism, or water weight gain. Here is a link to a blog on our website that may be informative: https://bonafide.attn.tv/aluqVSaRnoA2.

templates.name: I found a hair in my pint ( This can be used for bug/plastic but EDIT before sending)
templates.content:
First, we do apologize for your finding a hair in your ice cream. Your reaction is certainly warranted. The most important thing is for us to remedy the situation. Here at McConnell's, we do everything we can to accomplish one thing: make the finest ice creams on Earth. We achieve this by having exceptionally high standards across the board. This includes hair and beard nets, which typically provide an excellent barrier to something like this from ever occurring. But sometimes - and frankly, I can't explain how - things do happen. 

As a dairy and manufacturer, the most important thing we know about our business is this: we're not in the food business, we're in the food safety business. And while we can't ever know exactly how this hair found its way into your pint, we can commit to you that we'll continue to be vigilant in doing everything we can to eliminate the possibility of something like this happening.

If you kept the pint, can you please forward the code from the bottom of that pint. This will allow us to further our efforts as we investigate the issue. In the meantime, if you'd be kind enough to do so, please forward your mailing address. We'd love to offer you some free ice cream, sent straight to your home, as a token of our appreciation for bringing this to our attention. Your comments actually help us get better at what we do.

templates.name: How can I determine the square foot surface area of my pond?
templates.content:
To determine the square foot surface area of your rectangular or square pond simply multiply average length x average width = square feet of surface.

To determine square footage of surface area on your circular pond multiply (half the diameter) x (half the diameter) x 3.14 = square feet of surface.

templates.name: How long does your hair dye last?
templates.content: The length of time hair dye will last is based on several factors, including the condition of your hair, the color of your hair and your hair care products. The color may last for as long as two months or as little as one week. If your hair is bleached first, it'll generally stay vibrant longer, but make sure you consult a hair care specialist before you do it in order to make sure your locks can handle any chemical alterations.

templates.name: How does Aventure.2 differ from the Aventure?
templates.content:
While both models are still excellent fat tire ebikes for both off-roaders, adventurers, and casual riders alike, Aventure.2 has some of our newest features. Some of which, are Aventon firsts! 

Aventure.2 will still throttle on demand and can reach a top speed of 28 MPH when using pedal assist. The main difference is its upgraded torque sensor. While our cadence sensors previously recognized if you were pedaling and delivered a set amount of power per each assist level, the torque sensor recognizes how hard you're pedaling. 

The motor will then match your pedal cadence, giving you more assistance as you pedal faster or less if you pedal lighter, delivering a more natural riding experience. 

Aventure.2 is equipped with our fan-favorite Full Color Display, which intuitively tracks your rides and can connect to the Aventon app! It now has 4 pedal assist levels, ranging from eco, tour, sport, to turbo. It comes in new colorways with a front headlight and two rear brake lights that also act as turn signals! 

Available in both a step over and step-through frame, Aventure.2 includes a rear rack and fenders so you can transport all you need no matter where you explore!

templates.name: How much does it cost to replace a battery in an electric car?
templates.content: According to industry data, battery replacements are incredibly rare, with only about 1.5 percent of EVs needing actual replacements - and almost all of those replacements being done under warranty. (Battery warranties are generally eight to 10 years.) The actual cost of a complete replacement battery can be very high - in the tens of thousands of dollars - but most manufacturers are now training special service technicians to repair batteries by replacing faulty cells, instead of the entire battery pack.

templates.name: How do I measure the preload on my carrier bearings?
templates.content: It's nearly impossible to measure the preload on a carrier because it's in contact with the pinion at the time of assembly and therefore is receiving resistance from it as well. A carrier should have to be loaded in with some resistance, such as a few hits from a dead blow hammer. It shouldn not simply load in by hand, and it should not take a huge amount of force to put into place.

templates.name: Are your ingredients pasteurized?
templates.content: Our products are cold-pressed, not cooked, however our ingredients are pasteurized. We use organic wildflower honey that has been pasteurized and filtered through a 150 micron or finer filter. Our organic, non-fat dry milk and organic whole egg powder are pasteurized as well. These proteins are heat treated under pressure, then moisture is removed via dryers to produce a stable powder. Pasteurization kills pathogens and drying lowers the water activity to prevent bacterial growth.

templates.name: Can I do a ProLon cycle while I’m menstruating?
templates.content: None of our trials so far have studied the impact of ProLon on menstrual cycles, nor have we studied the optimal time to fast regarding female hormone levels. You can do a ProLon fast at any time during your menstrual cycle. However, based on studies that others have done on the impact of water fasting on female hormones, it may be optimal to take ProLon mid-cycle, during the luteal phase. Let me know if there is anything else I can help you with!

templates.name: You list discounts for some pieces due to "slight," "noticeable," or "considerable imperfections." What does this mean?
templates.content:
Most of our inventory is in excellent condition, but sometimes we find pieces that don't live up to our rigorous standards. Although we don't sell anything that's chipped or cracked, these pieces may show some signs of wear, so we feel it's only fair we lower their prices accordingly. Our classification system used to describe imperfections is as follows:

Slight imperfections (25%) - Pieces may show signs of slight wear or use.
Noticeable imperfections (50%) - Pieces will show visible use or wear, including surface scratches, minor trim wear, and color wear.
Considerable imperfections (75%) - Pieces will show substantial use or wear, including surface scratches, minor trim wear, and color wear.

We take a pattern's age and rarity into consideration during our inspection process, which means: if a pattern is really old and really rare, we won't grade it as harshly as we would a newer pattern that's easier to find.

templates.name: What's the best time to take creatine?
templates.content:
The best time to take creatine depends on your goals and routine, but here are the most effective options based on current research:
 
Most Effective Time: Post-Workout
Why: Your muscles are more receptive to nutrients after a workout.
Benefits: May improve muscle recovery, strength gains, and muscle growth.
Best practice: Take it with a meal or shake that includes protein and carbs.

The key is consistency, since creatine builds up in your muscles over time. If you're not training daily, just pick a time you'll remember to take it.

templates.name: How do I use a single-blade razor?
templates.content: Please don't press into your skin like you're using a plastic razor. It's weighted to add all the pressure you need to shave. Take it slow over bony areas (like shins & ankle bones) and have patience through the learning curve. Shave at the end of your shower so your skin and hair are soft. Apply Sugarcoat Moisturizing Shave-to-Gel Milk so your razor glides effortless over your skin. If your skin is particularly sensitive, shave in the direction of hair growth. Keep your skin moisturized between shaves with Featherweight Hydating Body Gloss as it helps to prevent ingrown hairs.

templates.name: What is the best way to care for my marble furniture?
templates.content:
Marble table tops are highly durable and need minimal care to maintain their beauty. Use a sealer - the marble sold in our showrooms is not sealed. Sealer can be purchased at home improvement or big box stores and applied in the home. Do not place hot items directly on the stone, use trivets or mats under hot dishes.

Stone surfaces can be cleaned with a few drops of neutral cleaner, stone soap (available at hardware stores), or a mild dishwashing detergent and warm water. Use a clean, soft cloth for best results. Please note that too much cleaner or soap may leave a film and cause streaks.

templates.name: How do I attach the Coravin Sparkling Stopper?
templates.content: Raise the locking handle to the "unlock" symbol in the most upright position. (You will see the guide with markings on the side of the stopper.) Then attach the Stopper onto the neck of the bottle. Firmly press the locking handle down until the handle is flush, (this may take some substantial force but do not be concerned, this is to attach the clamps onto the bottle; it will not harm the bottle). The Stopper is now ready for the gas to be inserted.

templates.name: How does home electric car charging work?
templates.content: To maximize the cost and convenience benefits of an electric car, you should charge it at home most of the time. Plugging in your EV overnight is convenient and also will help extend the life of your battery. All you need to do is plug the car in - just like you would a smartphone or laptop. Even better, the cheapest place and time to charge is at home while you're sleeping, because many electrical utilities offer discounted rates during late-night hours. In order to charge at home, you'll need to obtain a Level 2 charger - which is included in the purchase price of many but not all EVs - and have access to a 220-volt outlet where you park. If you don't have such an outlet available, you will need the assistance of a professional electrician.

templates.name: What materials are used to make a Siena?
templates.content:
The Siena is a supportive 10-inch 3-layer mattress. The first comfort layer is made up of 2" of gel-infused, polyurethane memory foam. The second layer is made up of 4" of support foam, and the sturdy base. The sturdy base is 4" of firm standing foam. These layers are wrapped in a soft and inviting polyester fabric.

All foams used in a Siena mattress are CertiPUR-US® Certified. This is a rigorous standard for materials, emissions, product durability and performance, assessed by independent, accredited testing laboratories. This means your Siena is made without ozone depletors, mercury, lead, formaldehyde, phthalates and other harmful substances that can be in consumer products.

templates.name: What is Vitamin B?
templates.content: Vitamin B is a catch-all term for a water-soluble group of vitamins. These are not chemically related, but are all essential for the working of enzymes in the body and are found in the same foods. They include B1 (thiamine), B2 (riboflavin), B6 (pyridoxine), and B12 (cobalamin).

templates.name: What is HYDRAGLOW and how do I use it?
templates.content:
It's a deep hydrating moisturizer to fight acne and aging.  To start, dip a clean fingertip into the jar & scoop a dime-size amount of it and then massage into face and neck area. The stem-cells & collagen-stimulating ingredients in it feed your skin exactly what
it needs to regenerate and produce beautiful, healthy new collagen. The best part? It's super rich and luxurious but will never break you out. All the benefits, none of the acne. You win every time. It has antioxidant and anti-inflammatory properties that are also helpful for those with rosacea.

templates.name: Can I adjust the widths on your boots?

With the insert and insole in, your boot will be a regular (D) fit, but if you take that insert out, the boot will have a relaxed (E+) fit. Keep in mind, this will only fit customers up to EE, anything larger would be an exception. See a demo here: https://fb.watch/2Zg5_Bnbnm/

templates.name: What should I do with a broken crystal?
templates.content: When the minerals break, they should be put away and thanked for all the help. Minerals should be thrown in the river (downstream) or buried in the ground (about 1.64 ft under). Mineral should be put back in the nature (river, ground). The person should not keep the broken stone since it could cause opposite effect.

templates.name: Can I have the jewelry appraised?
templates.content: Yes, you can get it appraised! Unfortunately, the diamond industry hasn't caught up yet with Simulated Diamonds. As a result, the appraisal sector of the industry hasn't caught up with them either. Recently, we have found that when having appraisals done, jewelry with gemstones like Moissanite or Simulated Diamonds are usually valued at the cost of just the Gold or Platinum setting and most jewelers and gemologists will not account for any value for the gemstones. Please keep in mind that a setting like this one without any gemstone whatsoever, in most jewelry stores would retail for about 3 times the amount that we're selling the complete wedding ring set for including the stones. In addition, we offer a Certificate of Authenticity as well as a Lifetime Warranty on all of our jewelry.

templates.name: Shipping protection / What is Route Insurance?
templates.content: Route Insurance allows you to buy additional shipping insurance for all orders, covering loss, damage, or theft while your item is en route. They take the hassle out of the equation, and handle everything from replacement costs to shipping labels when things go wrong. All you have to do is submit a quick claim, and they'll get to work for you. While we would provide the same guarantee for shipping matters, our expertise is in crafting shareable moments and Route has us beat when it comes to simplifying lengthy processes.

templates.name: How do I become a member of function with benefits?

templates.name: How do you set the wheels to a rockered alignment?
templates.content: First, unscrew the axle bolts and remove the wheels. Once removed, you will see the metal spacer which is inserted into the chassis. Then flipping the position of the spacers will lower the height of the two middle wheels into the "rocker" alignment position :)

templates.name: How hard are the wheels?
templates.content: The higher the durometer the harder the wheels. For reference, 72A is a bit soft but grippy. We use a 82A for our wheels, so it’s pretty hard that you can use it lightly outdoors.

templates.name: Do your skates work for wide feet?
templates.content: Narrow to normal width feet work best in our skates. The padding can feel a bit tighter. Wide feet we recommend a size up!

templates.content: Our inline skates can fit 70-72mm wheels.

templates.name: How sustainable are you? / Do you support charities?
templates.content: We care about our impact and endeavor to create a product that is conscious of this. Throughout all stages of design and production, we are mindful of every detail - from the materials to the manufacturing processes that we use. We also work with charities and causes that we feel passionate about and are aligned with who we are as a brand. Some of the causes and charities we have worked with include: Dangerous Females (Australia), Sea Shepard (Australia), Decks for Change, Australians in Film (USA), Hermosa Beach Education Foundation (USA), Good World Power of Peace (USA), REACH (Australia), Dili Skatepark (East Timor), Boarding for Breast Cancer (USA), and Victorian Aboriginal Child Care Agency (Australia).

templates.name: When should I replace the wheels on my skates?
templates.content: It really depends on various factors such as frequency of use, and the surface you're using it on! Do check your wheels regularly to make sure they are spinning properly, and aren't worn out. If the wheels aren't spinning freely, you'd have to check for damage, and replace it accordingly. :)

templates.name: What material do you use for your socks?

templates.name: Should I get quads or inlines? What's the difference?
templates.content: There are pros and cons! Quads are more stable, while inlines are faster and more maneuverable. Quads are easier for beginners, but inlines offer more ankle support. Inline skates may be easier for people who are used to ice skating, since the wheel configuration is similar to the blade. :)

templates.name: Do your products contain silicone?
templates.content: Yes, we strategically utilize high-performance silicones in many of our products to deliver softness, shine and protect against further loss of moisture. The silicones used in our products are water-soluble therefore alleviating concerns about buildup or unwanted "weight" on the hair. We never use lower grade silicones, which aren't water-soluble and act as "fillers" that weigh down and overload the hair. In addition, many products on the market utilize silicones only to address the cosmetic surface layer needs of the hair, resulting in temporary results. Our technologies-specifically our C3 Custom Care ComplexTM + Hydra-Protecting Technology-provide a more holistic approach and simultaneously repair and hydrate hair internally while also sealing and protecting the outer cuticle layer.

templates.name: Why did you increase your shipping rate?
templates.content:
After an extended period of refraining from adjusting our rates based on marketplace increases, we unfortunately, had no choice but to increase our international and domestic shipping rates to better reflect the actual costs of these services. We're increasing only as much as necessary in an effort to
continue to be able to offer the best merchandise prices for our customers.
All major couriers, including the USPS, have once again raised the price for their services beginning in January. In particular, the USPS has drastically altered many of its service classes and their associated costs. This greatly affects our ability to utilize some of these options. This is especially true for some of our international classes. We strive to offer the highest quality goods at the absolute best value in the marketplace. Thank you for your understanding.

templates.name: What is an Iron patch?
templates.content: Iron patches allow absorption of iron supplements through the skin, known as dermal absorption. Well-formulated iron patches should contain iron bisglycinate, a non-constipating and well-absorbed form of the mineral. Vitamin C and beta-carotene are also critical for optimal absorption and should be included in a high-quality iron patch.

templates.name: Why do I get a big waft of smoke in my face when I open the hood once the laser is complete?
templates.content: That occurs simply because you likely didn't wait long enough for the built-in exhaust fans to move the entire volume of smoke through the exhaust duct. The built-in exhaust fans are designed to clear the volume of the cabinet in 18-30 seconds from the time the job is completed.

The Coast XT is our 16' model, made for big water and longer paddling trips - it'll get you where you need to go faster! It has an adjustable footrest and can accommodate a person up to 6' 7", depending on position preference. It's capable of taking weight up to 400 lbs, including paddler and gear. Length: 16' (4.9 m)
Width: 25" (63 cm)
Weight: 34 lbs (15 kg)
Weight Capacity: 400 lbs (181 kg)
Cockpit: 16" x 30" (41 X 76 cm)

templates.name: LCV2: Lumens in 1.0 and 2.0
templates.content: The Lume Cube 2.0 is measured in LUX instead of Lumens. This is because LUX is a measurement of light output over a certain distance, which is a lot easier to apply to the real world than straight light output (Lumens). When it comes to LUX, 1.0 vs 2.0 are the same, however, 1.0 has more Lumens. This has to do with lens technology as well as how powerful the LED is inside the light. We went with less Lumens because we found after 4 years of using the Lume Cube and collecting customer feedback, people wanted a longer lasting light over a more powerful light. LC 2.0 lasts 1.5hrs on full charge, full brightness while 1.0 lasts 30min.

templates.name: What is an active ingredient?
templates.content: An active ingredient is the most potent part of the plant extract. We take the first extraction, which can be hundreds of times more effective than the last extraction from the same extract. Similar to how a tea bag works - the first cup of tea it makes is strong and intense, the more its used in additional cups, the weaker and less effective it becomes.

templates.name: Are your shampoo bars ph balanced?
templates.content: Most shampoo bars use a higher pH level, contain sulfates, or use silicon to mimic the effects of liquid shampoo. All of which can severely dry and damage your hair. Kitsch is carefully balanced and doesn't contain sulfates or silicone so your hair can retain its moisture and allow the rice water protein to work its hair-growth magic.

templates.name: Can I use Revaree with an IUD?
templates.content: There should be no interference with Revaree and IUD efficacy. While this hasn't been formally studied, the hormonal IUD works by thinning the uterine lining and the copper IUD incapacitates sperm, and both IUDs work in the uterus. Revaree, on the other hand, works by retaining moisture for the vaginal tissue - so Revaree and the IUD have different anatomic targets. However, as a precaution, we always recommend that you reach out to your healthcare professional as they know your specific medical history best.

templates.name: What do I eat after the fast is over?
templates.content: You can refer to the Transition Day Meal Plan, but in short, we advise you to keep your meals light and small. Start with liquid foods, like soups and fruit juices, followed by things like rice, pasta, and small portions of meat, fish, and/or beans.

templates.name: Do your bars have whole nuts?
templates.content: The nuts in our bars are crushed.

templates.name: What is the shelf life?
templates.content: There's an expiration date on the box located on the sticker at the bottom of the large kit. The typical shelf life is 4-6+ months, store in a cool dry place with no need to refrigerate. Similar to other foods, consuming our products after the best before date is not recommended. Expiration (or best before) dates are set to ensure consumers experience our products closest to how they were formulated and designed. Some ingredients, such as vitamins, naturally degrade over time. That's why we make efforts to deliver quality products in a timely fashion and recommend to our products be consumed shortly after being received.

templates.name: Is there anything perishable in the package?
templates.content: ProLon packages are shelf-stable and packaged to protect against normal and seasonal temperature fluctuations. They should be stored in a cool, dry place, out of direct sunlight, in their original packaging. They also don't need to be refrigerated while in their packaging, but can be if exposed to hot and/or humid weather.

templates.name: I'm concerned about food sensitivities
templates.content: We can't predict how everyone will respond to the program or a particular ingredient in the food. If you're concerned, you should discuss your food sensitivities with a healthcare provider before starting. It contains nuts, celeriac/celery, oats, and sesame, and should not be used if you have allergies to any of these ingredients. Some of our products (bars) are processed in a facility where peanuts, eggs, soy, wheat, milk, and shellfish are also present.

templates.name: Can I order only the fast bars?
templates.content: Of course! Here's where you can get them - https://fastbar.com/

templates.name: Will prolon work if I have a medical condition?
templates.content: Regarding any specific medical questions, we recommend consulting with your primary care physician to ensure that our products are safe and right for you. You shouldn't use it if you're allergic to nuts, oats, sesame, celery/celeriac, or other ingredients. It's a very low calorie diet designed to support fasting. Not everyone should fast. Don't use it if you have any pre-existing conditions or are taking any prescription medications, consult your healthcare provider before starting. Don't do it if you have an infection or may be at risk for a repetitive infection, if you're underweight, pregnant, breastfeeding, have a known, diagnosed or suspected eating disorder, or have dietary restrictions, as well as if you're under 18 or over 70.

templates.name: Why do I feel constipated or bloated?
templates.content: Any significant change in your diet can lead to changes in the gut, which may contribute to feelings of bloating and gassiness. If you typically consume a high fiber diet or a diet high in carbohydrates, you may become a bit constipated while on a fast, and this can lead to bloating.

templates.name: What if I'm still hungry during the fast?
templates.content: You should add food to the program only as a last resort if you are so incredibly hungry that you feel like you're going to break the fast. In such an instance, you may have a slice or two of apple, 1 stalk of celery, or 1 small Persian ("baby") cucumber of 5-6'' in length per day. For more additions, you can check out our blog post here - https://prolonfast.com/blogs/faqs/adding-additions-to-the-program?utm_campaign=%3Frfsn%3D6125862.9b60800&utm_medium=text&utm_source=attentive&externalId=9G33l

templates.name: Can I have tea, coffee, caffeine
templates.content: If you need caffeine, you can have either 1 cup (8fl oz) of coffee (no cream or sweetener), or 2 cups (16fl oz) of black or green tea (traditionally steeped, no matcha), or 6 cups (48fl oz) of decaf coffee (no cream or sweetener).

templates.name: What is the difference between a Classic Pakkawood knives and a Master Series Japanese Damascus Steel Knife Set?
templates.content:
The Master Series knives are not just fancier; they do offer some distinct features and enhancements compared to the Classic Pakkawood knives:

1. Handle Material:
- Classic Pakkawood Knives: Ergonomic Rare Green Pakkawood
- Master Series Knives: Durable faux ebony composite that's moisture and stain-resistant

2. Styling:
- Classic Pakkawood Knives: Traditional
- Master Series Knives: Contemporary

3. Blade Size:
- Classic Pakkawood Knives: Standard
- Master Series Knives: Oversized

4. Open Stock Knives:
- Classic Pakkawood Knives: Available
- Master Series Knives: Limited Edition

While both series share common features such as 67 layers of Damascus steel, full-tang construction, a 12-degree blade angle for sharpness, and a Rockwell Hardness Rating of 60+/-, the Master Series knives offer a more modern design, an upgraded handle material, larger blade size, and limited edition options.

templates.name: Do clip-in hair extensions shed?
templates.content: Just like your natural hair, extensions will shed. This, however, does not mean to reduce the amount you brush your extensions as you can minimize shedding in other ways. Keep in mind, extensions are more likely to shed when they are dry and brittle.

templates.name: Brightening Eye Masks: How to apply them

• Finish with Advanced Eye cream.

templates.name: My porch potty/grass is always smelly
templates.content: We find that some of the smell stems from urine around the base or the sides of the Porch Potty. Sometimes dogs will leak around the potty or accidentally spray some urine off of it and if that's not cleaned up, it will create a strong odor. Also, if you're not rinsing the Potty at least once a day, we recommend doing so to help flush the grass more frequently. You can also rinse your grass with a vinegar solution and/or 1-2 capfuls of bleach to a gallon of water. Another recommendation would be our odor eliminator TURFtastic to eliminate urine odor from your synthetic grass or live grass without deterring your dog from using the same spot: https://porchpotty.com/products/turftastic-the-first-odor-eliminator-for-dog-potties

templates.name: How much does public charging cost?
templates.content: The cost of public charging for your EV can vary widely depending on the charging network you are accessing, the type of charger you are connecting to, and how long you are charging for. The least expensive type of public charging will be on a slower Level 2 charger; a super-fast Level 3 charger will be the most expensive.Depending on the charging network and the region, you might pay for electricity by the kilowatt-hour (kWh) or for the time your car spends connected to the charger. You'll pay significantly more per minute or per kWh on a super-fast Level 3 charger - but will spend less time plugged in.

templates.name: Can I use both Quinton Hypertonic (QuintEssential 3.3) and Quinton Isotonic (QuintEssential 0.9) together? Which one to start with?
templates.content: When starting, always begin with isotonic for 1-3 months to restore the bioterrain. Whether you stay on it for 1-3 months depends on your state of imbalance, dysfunction, or depletion. You can then switch to hypertonic once daily. Hypertonic can be used up to 3x daily for those who may have very physical jobs or do intense exercise sessions. In addition, Isotonic is considered as the "medicine" and Hypertonic as the "nutrient". So, when you're working on improving complex health challenges, the Isotonic has superior identity with and accessibility to the extracellular terrain - proven over the past 125 years. There's no problem using hypertonic as a food or beverage additive to increase the amount of minerals & trace elements to compensate for what is missing.

templates.name: What's the difference between Royal Ossetra and Kaluga Hybrid Reserve?
templates.content:
We have two premium caviar options for sale - Royal Ossetra and Kaluga Hybrid Reserve. Ossetra is one of the most popular varieties of caviar due to its firm texture and nutty flavor. This briny option is known for its boldness and will wash over your palate like the seawater it comes from. You'll notice its combination of walnut finishes and salty complexities drive this type of caviar to be one of the best. The Ossetra Caviar is an ideal option to complement heavy cream, sauce and meat dishes thanks to its pleasing pop and bold taste profile.

Kaluga Hybrid Reserve Caviar is a visually stunning option with deep amber coloring and a rich, buttery flavor in every grain. If you're looking for caviar without a salty taste, this one is for you. Brimming with earthy tones and hints of salt, the Kaluga Hybrid Reserve is a dream to taste. It pleases the eye and the palate, providing you with a special endeavor you're sure to enjoy.

templates.name: Can I use Thermella and Relizen together/at the same time?
templates.content: Thermella and Relizen can be used together and work differently in the body to relieve hot flashes and night sweats. Thermella relieves hot flashes at the source by blocking NKB, a peptide in the body's thermoregulatory center that triggers hot flashes and night sweats. Relizen relieves hot flashes by inhibiting the reuptake of serotonin in the body. templates.name: How to winterize a washing machine
templates.content:
If you're storing your washing machine and dryer in an unheated location like a basement or garage or you're relocating from your summer home for the winter season, you want to protect your appliances to ensure they aren't exposed to below freezing temperatures. Washing machines have residual water in the pump and hoses that may freeze and damage your pipes in cold weather. As water freezes it expands, damaging the pipes in your home and unit. Keep in mind your warranty is invalidated if your washer is exposed to below freezing temperatures without protecting your unit.

Taking some precautions to winterize your washing machine will prevent damage and optimize performance. You can check out the instructions at the following link: https://www.lg.com/us/support/help-library/lg-washers-how-to-winterize-a-washing-machine-CT10000010-20151371417222

templates.name: How does the weight of a razor prevent razor bumps?
templates.content:
A properly weighted razor, such as the Bevel Safety Razor, actually solves a few common shaving problems. A well-balanced razor is neither head nor handle heavy. It provides a precise balance, allowing you to comfortably maneuver at a safe shaving angle (30°). 

A razor that is too light can foster a natural tendency to apply too much pressure. This can lead to both, irritation and cuts. Moreover, when too much pressure is applied while shaving, the hairs are likely to be cut beneath the skin, rather than at the surface.

templates.name: Difference between the platinum, gold and silver shavers
templates.content: Here's all you need to know! There are 3  main differences between the different Pitbull shavers: included blade type, included accessories, and features. The Pitbull Silver comes standard with a Carver blade which is specially designed for coarse or thick hair. The Pitbull Gold and Pitbull Platinum come standard with our most popular blade, the Forte. The Pitbull Platinum has all the same features of Pitbull Gold, PLUS a wash indicator, a travel lock function, a premium travel case, and a Platinum rinse stand. The Pitbull Platinum also comes with an extended 2-year warranty, while the other two only come with a 1-year warranty.

templates.name: How do I redeem / exchange reward points?
templates.content:
If you're redeeming points for a digital coupon, you can exchange it right at checkout. Once you're logged in and done adding products, you'll see an "exchange rewards points" drop down at the bottom of the shopping cart page. Select any digital coupon that you have enough points to redeem and click 'apply reward' and your discount will be reflected in your cart. 

If you're redeeming a product coupon, once you're logged in click 'my account' at the top right, then click the 'my rewards' option and then view the 'rewards' tab. Product coupons available will be shown under the 'product coupons' section. Select the product you'd like to redeem (be sure you have enough points) and click 'redeem points'. You can choose to either proceed to checkout or continue shopping.

templates.name: What are Clove shoes made of?
templates.content:
Our Classic Solo, Strada and Forte collections are designed to bring comfort, durability, and easy-to-clean support to healthcare workers. Built with Clarino™, these shoes are liquid-repellant and stain-resistant. Clarino™ is an advanced vegan fabric that has the same microstructure as genuine leather that protects your feet while on the job!

Alto combines comfort and stability with the breathability of an all-new ripstop fabric upper. A supple faux suede heel pillow provides a secure fit and flat and elastic sneaker laces make for maximum adjustability.

The Aeros collection is breathable, heat-regulating. Designed with our innovative CloveTech™ mesh fabric, the Aeros shoe supports you with flexible material for agility while still protecting your feet with easy-to-clean comfort.

templates.name: What if Feeder-Robot goes offline? Will it still feed my pet?
templates.content: Yes! If you use the Whisker app to set your pet's feeding schedule, you can rest assured that your pet will still be fed should the unit go offline. The Feeder-Robot saves the feeding schedule locally on the unit. Whether the unit is connected to the network or offline, once it has a schedule programmed to it via the control panel keypad or downloaded to it from the app, Feeder-Robot will continue to feed on that specific schedule until it is updated. If the Status Indicator Tower light is blue, then the unit is running a programmed schedule.

templates.name: Sizing
templates.content: We recommend that you take a t-shirt of your own that fits perfectly, lay it on a flat surface, and measure from where the neckline meets the shoulder seam all the way down to the bottom hem. This will give you the length. Then place the measuring tape 1 inch below the armpit seam and measure left to right, giving you the width. From there you can reference our sizing chart to determine the best fit: http://www.themountain.com/sizing/ Please note that due to the manufacturing process of our t-shirts, we have an allowable size variation of 5% in width and 7% in length for all our products.

templates.name: Why do your products cost more online than in store?
templates.content:
We are a small, growing company and do our best to keep our prices low. We sell wholesale to a variety of stores and they set their own pricing. These stores don't carry our full line of products, but you can find those on our True citrus website. Walmart, for example, is a very large corporation that does billions of dollars in sales in thousands of stores across the country. Because they offer so many different items, they are able to keep their prices low. We couldn't possibly compete with the low prices that Walmart is able to offer. 

We will offer discount codes on our web site so keep an eye out for those, they can help with the price differences. However, if you are not happy with the price you paid, you are welcome to return the product to us and we will refund the price you paid. 😊

templates.name: How can I get my curls to hold / last / stay curled?
templates.content: Be sure to allow your curls to cool completely before touching them or brushing through and you can also use a heat protectant hold spray before Beachwaving. After each curl, keep it coiled and pin to your head for at least 5 minutes to allow the wave pattern to set. Avoid using heavy creams, oils, or serums. These can often weigh down the hair and make it harder to hold a curl. Also, you can book a free virtual styling session with one of our salon professionals here: https://beachwaver.com/pages/virtualstyling They can give you more tips and tricks!

looking fresh on the go.

templates.name: Are your blends FDA approved?
templates.content: Since the FDA focuses on food and drugs, they don't regulate or approve supplements. The FDA does have the authority to inspect facilities to make sure they comply with safe manufacturing practices, but they don't approve supplements directly. Manufacturers and distributors are responsible for making sure their products are safe before they go to market. All of our manufacturers operate in FDA compliant (CGMP) facilities. CGMP refers to the Current Good Manufacturing Practice regulations enforced by the FDA. In other words, we're as close to FDA approved as a supplement can possibly get.

templates.name: Black bridesmaid & special occasion dresses recommendation
templates.content: Wonderful! I'd recommend taking a look at our collection here: https://balticborn.com/collections/bridesmaid-black

templates.name: Rewards program
templates.content: We have a rewards program where you can earn points to redeem on future purchases. Check it out here: https://zox.la/#smile-home

templates.name: Sizing
templates.content: Happy to help you find the right size! Our clothes generally run true to size. Would you mind sharing your usual size? You can also refer to our sizing chart on each product page.

templates.name: Customer support
templates.content: The best way to handle this is to email us directly at hello@jackhenry.co. Our team is happy to help!

templates.name: Do you ship internationally?
templates.content: Yes! We process and ship in-stock products Mon-Fri. Orders placed after 12 pm EST or on a non-business day are considered next business day. Please see our international shipping options here: https://www.rubylove.com/shipping-information

templates.name: How long does it take to charge a Pitbull shaver?
templates.content: Pitbull Gold and Platinum shavers take 2.5 hours to fully charge. Pitbull Silver Shavers take 1 hour to fully charge.

templates.name: Do you ship to P.O. boxes or APO/FPO addresses?
templates.content: I'm afraid we cannot ship to P.O. boxes, and APO/FPO addresses. Apologies for the inconvenience!

templates.name: Can I use rewards towards subscriptions?
templates.content: Yes, you can apply your rewards points to subscription refills. If you have at least 100 points, you can use the points towards a discount on future subscription orders.

templates.name: Military / First responder / Healthcare / Teacher discount
templates.content: Thank you for your service! We don't have any specific discounts like that, but our deals will always be shared with our SMS subscribers or on our website, so keep an eye out!

templates.name: What is Fabletics BeneFits Rewards Program?
templates.content:
Fabletics BeneFits is a loyalty program for VIP members of Fabletics. VIPs can earn points by making purchases or submitting product reviews. You will earn 2 points for every dollar spent at Fabletics.com, YITTY.com, and Fabletics stores. Points are rounded to the nearest dollar (e.g., $54.95 USD = 110 points). If an item is returned for a refund, the points earned for that purchase will be deducted from your account. 

You can earn 20 Reward Points when you share your opinion about any Outfit you've purchased. You're eligible to earn Cash Rewards or free gear as soon as you earn 500 points. Save your points further and at 2,000 points, you can redeem for a FREE Outfit!

templates.name: What is the shelf-life on your products?
templates.content: Most of our products have a 20+ year shelf life. You can also check the bottom of the individual product page for more details.

templates.name: Where is the UPC code?
templates.content: The UPC code is located on the back bottom right of most of our products, this is the barcode used to scan at the registers. Please include the little number at the start, the bold numbers in the middle, and the little number at the end.

templates.name: Rewards / referral
templates.content: We have a rewards program where you can earn points to redeem on future purchases. Check it out here: https://boarderie.com/pages/rewards-no-account

templates.name: What address should I ship the registry gift to?
templates.content: You can choose to send the product to any address you like! To send the product directly to the registrant, select "ship to recipient address" during the check-out process. If you would like to have it shipped to your own address please ensure that you are still purchasing through the recipient's registry and just make the shipping address the same as the billing address.

templates.name: Your necklace extenders are too long. I'm looking for a shorter one
templates.content: Our necklace extenders are a max length of 10 inches, however, these are adjustable, meaning you can turn any chain into an adjustable chain and you can choose a more specific length.

templates.name: How long can I leave on dog shoes?
templates.content: I recommend not leaving dog shoes on for more than 2-3 hours. While our dog shoes protect your dog's paws, you'll want to make sure that your dog's paws get some time to "cool off" and relax!

templates.name: What day will my flower subscription be delivered?
templates.content: Depending on the day you first choose for your flower delivery and cadence, we'll deliver on that day for all future deliveries. So, if you get your flowers delivered on Thursday bi-weekly, you'll get another flower delivery two weeks later on a Thursday.

templates.name: How long will it take to receive my refund?
templates.content: Once your return is received back at our warehouse, please allow up to 3-5 business days for our returns team to process the items.
